projects.title: asyncwhois
projects.description: asyncio compatible WHOIS module for Python

projects.title: deep.surf
projects.description: Machine Learning API for Real-time Phishing Detection
projects.body: Cybersecurity and Data Science mash-up that aims to predict whether a given website is a phish or not. After carefully extracting features from HTML tags, Network traffic, and WHOIS queries, an XGBoost model was trained on a dataset of over 100k URLs. This model is hosted using AWS SageMaker Endpoint Service.

projects.title: Deploying Flask apps into AWS ECS with Terraform
projects.description: Tutorial for deploying containerized apps into AWS using the IaC tool, Terraform

projects.title: PySpark 101: Capital BikeShare
projects.description: Data Science project utilizing AWS EMR and PySpark ML

projects.title: Project for AvantGuardians LLC
projects.description: Freelance web development project for AvantGuardians LLC
projects.body: AvantGuardians is an art sharing platform where artists can connect, collaborate, and post their work. The founder contacted me with plans for creating a simple, cheap, and maintainable website. He mentioned other estimates for monthly costs were about $150-$300/month after a significant down payment. I was able to deliver a solution that utilizes Python's Flask web-framework as well as various AWS services such as SES, S3, RDS, and ECS for $50/month.
